author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Guddu Ki Gun
text:
Credits
Director: Directed by Shantanu Ray Chhibber, Sheershak Anand
Producer: Emenox Media Pvt. Ltd
Cast: Kunal Khemu, Payel Sarkar
Synopsis:
Guddu Ki Gun is an erotic comedy film about Guddu (Kunal) who is a washing powder salesman in Kolkata.
Release Date: October 30, 2015
WATCH: Guddu Ki Gun - Motion Poster - Kunal Khemu - Erecting in Cinemas 30th OCT.
